[[1977â78 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1977â78]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] has promoted from [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1975â76 Turkish Second Football League|1975â76]], after two season break to first division. It was the second time the team promoted to first division. In the first time, they have remained at the league for seven season. This second promotion had let the team to stay two more seasons. The [[1976â77 Turkish First Football League|1976â77]] season was the eighth season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish First Football League]] in total. They finished seventh in the league. General captain was Mustafa OÄultÃ¼rk (11.10.1976). ==Pre-season== Before the start of the league, MÄ°Y played eight preparation matches. Two matches were played with Ä°skenderunspor in Mersin on 14th and 15 August. Then the team moved to Adana to play "Ãukurova Football Tournament"."Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu will play 8 preparation matches until league matches". Winner became eligible for [[European Champion Clubs Cup]], runner-up and third teams became eligible for [[UEFA Cup]] next season. [[Trabzonspor]] also won the [[Turkish Cup]]. [[BeÅiktaÅ J.K.|BeÅiktaÅ]] was the cup finalist and became eligible for [[European Cup Winners Cup]] next year.
